about: Hi, I'm **M Mahesh Babu**, a passionate **front-end developer** with expertise in **React**. I’ve gained hands-on experience through a **MERN Stack internship at Brain'o Vision** and **one-month internships at Intersavy and Codsoft**, working on real-world projects that enhanced my skills. Inspired by leaders like **Ratan Tata**, I strive to create impactful and innovative web solutions. Beyond coding, I enjoy reading, exploring new technologies, and constantly upgrading my knowledge. My goal is to contribute to meaningful projects while growing both personally and professionally. Let’s connect and build something amazing!
